edge_1: Chris Evans, who portrays Steve Rogers / Captain America in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, returns to his role for Avengers: Infinity War.
edge_2: In early March 2018, Disney moved the release of Infinity War in the United States to April 27, 2018, to have it be released the same weekend as some of its international markets.
edge_3: In early March 2018, Disney moved the release of Infinity War in the United States to April 27, 2018.

edge_1: Chris Hemsworth, who portrays Thor in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, returns to his role for Avengers: Infinity War.
edge_2: In early March 2018, Disney moved the release of Infinity War in the United States to April 27, 2018, to have it be released the same weekend as some of its international markets.
edge_3: In early March 2018, Disney moved the release of Infinity War in the United States to April 27, 2018.
